title: Umbrex thought leadership
content: Produce Unleashed, the leading podcast on how to thrive as an independent professional
bullet_points: Managing Partner Will Bachman recognized as a “Power Player Consulting” by Business Insider
Invited speaker on independent consulting at business schools including Harvard, Wharton, Columbia, and Kellong
Over 1,000 consultants have used our video guide to set up their own practice
Organized over 300 events for independent consultants
